entry.title: WIND WARNING , Waterton Park
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:36 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Waterton Park Gate 1:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
Temperature: 3.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 48 %
Dewpoint: -6.5°C
Wind: WSW 37 km/h gust 59 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. A few flurries near the British Columbia border overnight. Local blowing snow near the British Columbia border overnight. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming southwest 70 gusting to 100 late this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries near the British Columbia border. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Local blowing snow near the British Columbia border in the morning. Amount 2 cm near the British Columbia border. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
